gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `FinancialAssets` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `FinancialAssets` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `FinancialAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancialAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancialAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancialAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancialAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancialAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancialAssetsMovementEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_FinancialAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
